summary: A ruthless rancher, and his gang, use extremely long range rifles to kill the men who kidnapped his infidel wife.
cast: Oliver Reed|Candice Bergen|Gene Hackman|Simon Oakland|Mitchell Ryan|L.Q. Jones|William Watson|G.D. Spradlin|Rayford Barnes|Ronald Howard|Bernard Kay|Richard Adams|Dean Selmier|Sarah Atkinson|Francesca Tu|Marian Collier|Ralph Brown|Charly Bravo|Rafael Albaicín|Eugenio García|Christine Larroude|Stephanie Pieritz|Emilio Rodríguez|Max Slaten|Lilibeth Solison|Bud Strait|María Luisa Tovar
title: Caza implacable
